odd.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: different from what is normal or expected, especially in a way that you disapprove of or cannot understand
odd.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: It was an odd thing to say.
There was something odd about him.
What she did was unforgivable, but the odd thing was he didn’t seem to mind.
She was holding an extremely odd-looking weapon.
It seemed odd that he wanted a picture of me.
odd.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Any odd scrap of paper will do.
odd.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: separated from a pair or set
